name: Waste Processing Plant Fire
details: A waste processing plant has caught fire, releasing thick black smoke over the northern suburbs.
rawText: A waste processing plant in Mandur, Bengaluru, has caught fire, sending thick black smoke over the northern suburbs.

name: Massive Chemical Leak
details: A massive chemical leak has been reported at an industrial facility, prompting officials to evacuate nearby residents.
rawText: A massive chemical leak has been reported at an industrial facility in Lingarajapuram, Bengaluru, prompting officials to evacuate nearby residents.

name: Gas Pipeline Rupture
details: A gas pipeline rupture has resulted in a major fire and significant traffic disruptions.
rawText: A gas pipeline rupture near Electronic City Phase 1, Bengaluru, has caused a major fire and traffic gridlock.
